summary: Less clothing for Human Female NPC\'s
descriptionHtml:
16/11/2011 - v0.3 UPDATE
Edited all forsworn meshes to point to various textures by other modders to give variety.
Read the Changelog.txt for details and credits.
If anyone has a problem with using their textures, please let me know.

=========================================================================================
A bit of experimenting.

For the eye candy, so far, there has been a few nude mods, a few underwear mods, and a sexy forsworn clothing mod.
I have renamed the meshes for all these and added them so that NPC human females could be wearing them.

If you use these mesh files in combination with the other texture mods already posted, it could make skyrim a little bit more interesting.
Editing the nif texture paths to point to different color variants would also be good, i think.

Installation - Just add the meshes folder to your skyrim data folder.
In-game most of the NPC human females will be affected.

Thor

=====================================================================================
3 Options: Forsworn; Underwear; Nude
Don\'t forget, you can swop/rename the files to suit yourselves.

Affected Human Female NPC\'s
=========================== 
archmage
barkeeper
beggarclothes
blacksmith
chef
farmclothes01
farmclothes02
farmclothes03
farmclothes04
fineclothes01
fineclothes02
mageapprentice
magejourneyman
merchantclothes
minerclothes
redguard
wench
================================
